title: 2018 Sheky Awards
itunes:title: 2018 Sheky Awards
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Handsome Hank and Matt "Money" Smith to announce the winners of the 23rd Annual Sheky Awards as the year 2018 comes to a close. The fellas get into some heated debate over some storied categories such as Best Non-Football-Playing Guest (19:35) and The Shek Republic's Choice Award (24:30). Also, the guys discuss who will be crowned this season's MVP, highlighting Patrick Mahomes and Philip Rivers in this week's edition of 'Flake It or Make It' (31:33). Shek also introduces some new awards categories such as Kent Brown's Mom Voicemail of the Year (12:48) and Best Investigation of the Year (36:07) before getting to the granddaddy of them all, Best Fruit 2018 (51:28).


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
